snippet: Investors are about to find out just how bad last year was for the country’s biggest financial institutions, which were hit by the European debt crisis and new regulations.
abstract: Investors are about to find out just how bad last year was for the country’s biggest financial institutions, which were hit by the European debt crisis and new regulations.

headline.main: Wall Street Braces for Dismal 4th Quarter
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Is Bracing For Dismal 4th Quarter
